name: Minichip Adventure
description:
A virus army has invaded the motherboard. It's up you, the security chip SMC-7410, to deal with them and regain control of the circuit.
Destroy all malware and solve the puzzle at each terminal to proceed.

An Xbox 360 controller is recommended.

Dialogue is currently in brazilian portuguese only, but reading is not required to play the game.

Keyboard controls:
[W/A/S/D] Move player
[ARROW KEYS] Shoot
[SPACE] Interact with terminals
